title: La Mujer del Vendaval
overview: La Mujer del Vendaval (The Lady from Vendaval) is a Mexican telenovela produced by Mapat L. de Zatarain for Televisa. It is a remake of the Venezuelan telenovela Un esposo para Estela. Ariadne Díaz and José Ron star as the main protagonists, while Chantal Andere, Marco Muñoz, Manuel "Flaco" Ibáñez, Florencia del Saracho, and Javier Jattin star as the main antagonists.
